colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008A *, ,(CES DPAL LDAN DMAG ZOR RGYAL MO LA BSANG MCHOD 'BUL TSUL BSAM 'PHEL YID BZHIN NOR BU ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI STOBS KYIS 'KHOR LOS BSGYUR BA CHING GIS RGYAL PO NI GDUNG RGYUD DU KHRUNGS PA'I DAD PA DANG 'BYOR BA GZHON NU LEGS TSOGS PA 'JAM DBYANGS RDO RJE ZHANG GI SNGOS PA DANG STOB DANG LNGA TSE RING RDO RJES 'DI 'BRU BA ZHIG DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA'I NGOR, SH'AKYA'I BTZUN PA SU MA TI MA nYI PRA DZNY'AS BRIS PA'I YI GE PA NI RDO RJE DPYOD SNGAS PA GU SHRI CHOS RJE KUN DGA' RIN CHEN NO, ,'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PA DANG, , 'GRO KUN GYI BYANG CHUB BSGRUB PA'I LAM GYI BAR CHAD ZHI ZHING RDZOGS PA'I SANGS RGYAS KYI GO 'PHANG THOB PAR GYUR CIG , ,,DE LEGS 'PHEL, ,DGE'O, ,)
